values: *carefully and quietly slinks out of bed when he can't sleep out of sheer fear of nightmares and puts on his trademark white yukata <s>cause wandering around the inn naked is not recommended</s>, coming back to Remeses' side of the bed and just watching him for a moment, smiling to himself and brushing a long strand of hair from the man's face and leaning down to kiss his forehead before leaving the room silently, slinking down the stairs and wandering the halls (of the not-rooms-part so it's not creepy)*

*comes into the inn and starts removing his coat, freezing for a moment when he realizes a very strong and important energy source isn't present and continues his movements slowly, glancing around as he climbs the stairs and knocks his knuckles lightly on Asham's half-open door to announce himself* Where is Remeses?
*folds his hands in his lap and turns to the man next to him* This is a nice little place, isn't it?
You know, of all the occupations I could think of, I never would've guessed you to be a barista.
*blinks hard and slowly leans away from the screen he's been in front of for the last day and a half, lifting his hand and trying to focus on it*
*lays against the floor of the basement room, staring off with neglected tears in his unblinking eyes, sporatically shivering*
*storms into the woods, following Keriko's aura*

~*~Result nr 1~*~

Your power is: Clairvoyance


Explanation: Your power is that you can
look into the future and see what is coming.
How far and long you can look is all depending
on your skill level. This can, as all powers,
be used in both evil and good. Even if it may
seem like a boring ability it is a huge
responsibility for the carrier, becase they are
constantly tempted with doing the wrongs deeds
(e.g. cheat on a test). It takes high morals to
not be brought down with it.
Therefor you fit with this power quite well.
You take responsibility and do what is the
right thing to do. This does not make you a
saint, since you're only human after all. But
it makes a trustworthy person and you are loyal
to camrades and/or team mates. In school you
were probably a good student. If you were
social varies from person to person, but most
clairvoyant people tend to prefer their own
company or that of close friends and family.
That is because you are wise and knows how to
treasure the reliable in your life, since you
know popularity can be a false element. You are
also not that big on taking risks and prefer
what is already explored. That is because you
don't like suprises, they can turn out bad and
then you won't be in control.
Negative aspects: Since you're always
doing the right thing and being trustworthy all
the time you can become frustrated. Also, all
that you carry on your shoulders may stress you
out. You need to relax to be in good mental
shape.



What Power is Compatible With You? [beautiful anime pictures + 12 detailed results]

I know everyone's concerned about Yumerou right now, and with good reason... But I really don't want to leave Cischa alone today...
Kuna, I must speak with you.

Things have been surprisingly calm. There hasn't been too much that I've had to deal with; on top of things being mellow, Ri's taking care of a lot of work, as well. I've actually been able to sleep for a couple of nights now. It's nice.

...I think I should look into this Kuna person...

There. Now hopefully, I'll be able to keep up with people a little better. Yumerou said he's met a lot of interesting people around here, too. I don't know why everyone decided to come here, but I guess I'll find out, won't I?

((::twitchy:: icons. >.*)
